summary: The customer reached out to Contoso Wireless to upgrade their service to include streaming. The agent informed them about Contoso Prime, a streaming service that offers thousands of movies and TV shows for just $9.99 per month. The customer was also told that they could get the first month free if they signed up now, and that there were no cancellation fees or hidden charges if they decided to cancel their subscription. The customer was satisfied with the agent's help and excited to start using Contoso Prime.
